title: SignalK
description: Root schema of Signal K. Contains the list of vessels plus a reference to the local boat (also contained in the vessels list).

self.description: This holds the key (MMSI or other unique ID) of this vessel, the actual data is in the vessels array.

sources.description: A wrapper object for source objects (vessels, marinas, etc), each describing Signal K sources in network range, including this vessel.

(^[2-7][0-9]{8,8}$|^[A-F0-9]{8,8}$).description: This regex pattern is used for validation of an MMSI or UUID identifier for the source

resources.description: resources to aid in navigation and operation of the vessel

timestamp.description: timestamp of the last update to this data
